title: conferred on me by section 46(2) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 46(1))
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Section 46(1)) 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (section 46(1)) (commencement) order 2024

title: conferred on me by section 46(2) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022),
heading: 2. The 1st day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which section
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of April 2024 is appointed as the day on which section 

46(1) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 March, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [101] 3
